title: Meta?
body: What are the meta champion this patch? Coming back competitively but I extremely out the loop since I don't whats good or bad. {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

replies.body:
Zed is meta

Yasuo is meta

Riven is still meta 

Vayne was meta until they nerfed {{item:3124}} 

idk of any others exept maybe {{champion:63}}  with new buffs as a support

Mid
Anything that can run glacial augment is good. Lux is somehow good even in dia. Kata is managing to get +50% winrate. Malza is sitting on nice numbers. And Vlad of course. Any onetrick you like.

Top
Classic bruisers, Ire, Jax. Aatrox, Rene, Jayce. Any mage, Neeko, Kennen, Vlad. Darius has nice numbers, but he is jugg so getting kitted and stuff...

Not sure for other lanes, these are my main.

Just look [here](https://mobalytics.gg/blog/lol-tier-list-for-climbing-solo-queue/) for more reliable info on all lanes. Champs I said have either good numbers or I'm playing them with nice winrate, mobalitics are better source than boards.
